distribution_strategy: The document is divided among 4 SubMasters based on logical section groupings. The Abstract and Introduction are grouped together for a high-level overview, while the Body is split into two parts for detailed analysis, and the Conclusion is handled separately for synthesis. This ensures balanced workload and logical coherence.

submasters.role: Summarize Abstract and Introduction sections for overview
Analyze first half of the Body for key findings and methodology
Analyze second half of the Body for results and discussion
Summarize Conclusion and synthesize key takeaways
